name: TransplantStemCellAndSolid
title: Transplant, Stem Cell and Solid
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for transplants, both stem cell and solid.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts encoded by CPT, HCPCS, ICD10CM, ICD10PCS, and SNOMEDCT that describe stem cell and solid transplants.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
